name: Unstable: Incendiary Cargo
description:
This game was made for Ludum Dare 49: Unstable. I'm in a Discord with Ludum Dare participants and someone said I hope there's lots of explosions. I made this for that person. Side note, I did not have much time for sounds, what you hear was done in last hour.

Latest version contains minor bug fix at final checkpoint regarding the score. The original submission will be available to download (BuildWithSound.zip).
